abstract: Dominique Strauss-Kahn, the former chief of the International Monetary Fund whose career unraveled in a series of sex scandals, was named a board member of a banking subsidiary of Rosneft.
snippet: Dominique Strauss-Kahn, the former chief of the International Monetary Fund whose career unraveled in a series of sex scandals, was named a board member of a banking subsidiary of Rosneft.

headline.main: Strauss-Kahn Re-emerges in Finance, in Russia
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chief Of I.M.F. Joins Bank In Russia
